entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
